noticetemplate:
Title of Special:NoticeTemplate page, should be identical to centralnotice message. (Since the extension uses a secondary tab interface, the effective page title is actually centralnotice-manage-templates.)
{{Identical|Central notice admin}}
bannerallocation:
Title of Special:BannerAllocation page, should be identical to centralnotice message. (Since the extension uses a secondary tab interface, the effective page title is actually centralnotice-view-allocation.)
{{Identical|Central notice admin}}
centralnoticelogs:
Title of Special:CentralNoticeLogs page, should be identical to centralnotice message.  (Since the extension uses a secondary tab interface, the effective page title is actually centralnotice-view-logs.)
{{Identical|Central notice admin}}
protect-level-centralnotice-admin: Description of a protection level, used in protection log entries and in form to set protection levels.
restriction-level-centralnotice-admin: Used on [[Special:ProtectedPages]] and [[Special:ProtectedTitles]]. An option in the drop-down box 'Restriction level'.
centralnotice-desc:
The [[mw:Extension:CentralNotice|CentralNotice extension]] allows a notice to be posted centrally to several wikis.
{{desc|name=CentralNotice|url=https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:CentralNotice}}
centralnotice-summary: Used as summary in [[meta:Special:CentralNotice|CentralNotice]] special page for [[mw:Extension:CentralNotice]]
centralnotice-modify:
Submit button on:
* "change translation language" dialog box on [[m:Special:NoticeTemplate]].
* "add campaign" form on [[m:Special:CentralNotice]] (only when sufficent access rights).

{{Identical|Submit}}
centralnotice-save-banner:
Label for the submit button which saves a CentralNotice banner.
{{Identical|Save}}
centralnotice-live-preview: Text for a live site preview/render of the most recent saved version current banner
centralnotice-translate-heading:
Fieldset label. Parameters:
* $1 - a name of a template
centralnotice-manage: Title of sub-page of [[meta:Special:CentralNotice|Manage Central Notice]] special page.
centralnotice-manage-templates: Title of sub-page of [[meta:Special:NoticeTemplate|Manage Banners]] special page.
centralnotice-add-notice-button:
Used as label for the Submit button in the "Create banner" dialog.
{{Identical|Create}}
centralnotice-add-template: Used as link text and as heading (<nowiki><h2></nowiki> tag)
centralnotice-language-listing:
{{optional}}
A language listing for the language multi-select box.
* $1 - the language code
* $2 - the name of the language
centralnotice-banner-name: Used as label for the "Banner name" ("Template name") input box in [[Special:NoticeTemplate]].
centralnotice-templates: * Used as $1 in {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-log-label}}. * Used as column header of the table. * Used as link text. The link points to [[Special:NoticeTemplate]]. {{Identical|Banner}}
centralnotice-throttle: Label for a checkbox used to limit traffic to a campaign
centralnotice-throttle-amount: Label for a dropdown menu listing the maximum percentage of traffic which will be allocated to a campaign
centralnotice-balanced: Label for a checkbox which will cause all banners in a campaign to be given the same weight
centralnotice-weight:
Used in Notice Details page of [[meta:Special:CentralNotice|Central Notice]] special page.
* Used as label for the "Weight" select box.
* Used as column header of the table in [[Special:CentralNotice]].
{{Identical|Weight}}
centralnotice-notice-mixins-fieldset: Label of the field set with the controls for mixins associated with campaigns (a.k.a. notices).
centralnotice-notice-mixins-int-required: Message that an integer is required for a campaign mixin parameter.
centralnotice-notice-mixins-float-requir: Message that a floating point number is required for a campaign mixin parameter
centralnotice-notice-mixins-out-of-bound: Message that the value entered is not within the specified boundary values
centralnotice-notices:
Used as link text in the tab in [[Special:CentralNotice]]. The link points to [[Special:CentralNotice]].
{{Identical|Campaign}}
centralnotice-notice-exists: Error message displayed in Special:CentralNotice when trying to add a notice with the same name of another notice.
centralnotice-template-exists: Error message displayed in [[Special:NoticeTemplate]] when trying to add a template with the same name of another template.
centralnotice-notice-doesnt-exist: Error message displayed in [[Special:NoticeTemplate]] when trying to update a date of a template.
centralnotice-remove-notice-doesnt-exist: Error message displayed in [[Special:NoticeTemplate]] when trying to remove a template.
centralnotice-banner-doesnt-exist: Error message displayed in [[Special:NoticeTemplate]] when trying to view a banner (a template).
centralnotice-banner-edit-onwiki: Label for navigation link to the edit mode of wikipage for the banner. Shown in subtitle of Special:CentralNoticeBanners
centralnotice-banner-history: Label for navigation link to the history of the wikipage where the banner is hosted. Shown in subtitle of Special:CentralNoticeBanners
centralnotice-template-still-bound:
Error message displayed when a banner (name: $1) cannot be removed because it is still in use.

Parameters:
* $1 - banner name (template name)
centralnotice-project-lang: Used as label for the "Language" select box in [[Special:BannerAllocation]].
centralnotice-select-all:
Select all items in a list.
{{Identical|Select all}}
centralnotice-remove-all:
Remove all items from a list.
{{Identical|Remove all}}
centralnotice-items-selected:
Identifies the number of items in a list. Parameters:
* $1 - the number of items (0 or more items). It can be used for PLURAL.
centralnotice-assigned-templates:
Used as fieldset label in the form in [[Special:CentralNotice]].

Followed by the message {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-no-templates-assigned}} or the table.
centralnotice-no-templates:
Used in [[Special:CentralNotice]] and [[Special:NoticeTemplates]].

Can be followed by the link text {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-add-template}}.
centralnotice-no-templates-assigned:
Used in [[Special:CentralNotice]].

Preceded by the fieldset label {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-assigned-templates}}.
centralnotice-template-already-exists: Used as error message when trying to add a banner (template) to a campaign.
centralnotice-change-lang: Fieldset legend for a language selector, that is used to set a preference for which language to translate to in the translation module of the extension CentralNotice.
centralnotice-notice-is-locked: Error message displayed in Special:CentralNotice when trying to delete a locked notice
centralnotice-invalid-date-range:
Used as error message when trying to update date range of a campaign.
{{Identical|Date}}
centralnotice-null-string:
Used as error message.

Refers any one of the following: name of banner, body of banner, name of notice.
centralnotice-no-notices-exist: Used in Special:CentralNotice when there are no notices
centralnotice-number-uses:
The header of a narrow column in the table with sitenotice campaign information. The values in the column are the numbers of times that a message enclosed in three curly brackets appears in the banner's code. The width of the column is 5% of the total width of the table, so the message should be accordingly short.

In English this is a short form of "Number of uses".
centralnotice-edit-template:
Used as fieldset label in the form in [[Special:NoticeTemplate]].

Followed by {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-edit-template-summary}}.
centralnotice-edit-template-summary: Used as summary of the text area for editing banner content in [[Special:NoticeTemplate]].
centralnotice-edit-template-magicwords:
List of available magic words. Parameters:
* $1 - magic words
centralnotice-message-not-set: Used if the native text of the banner message is not set, in [[Special:NoticeTemplate]].
centralnotice-campaigns-using-banner: On the banner edit page, title of subsection showing campaigns associated with the banner.
centralnotice-fieldset-preview: Used as a title for banner preview section on banner editing screen
centralnotice-update-preview: Used as label for update banner preview button
centralnotice-preview-page: Text for link to open a new tab with an in-page preview of the currently edited banner
centralnotice-preview-loader-error-dialo: Title for dialog box for error messages from generating a banner preview.
centralnotice-preview-loader-permissions: Permissions or edit token verification error message for requests to generate a banner preview.
centralnotice-clone-notice: Used as fieldset label in the form in [[Special:NoticeTemplate]].
centralnotice-clone-name:
Used as label for the "Name" input box in [[Special:NoticeTemplate]].

Preceded by the fieldset label {{msg-mw|centralnotice-clone-notice}}.

The input box is followed by the Submit button. Its label is {{msg-mw|centralnotice-clone}}.
{{Identical|Name}}
centralnotice-clone-banner:
Used as label for the banner in the form in [[Special:NoticeTemplate]].
{{Identical|Banner}}
centralnotice-insert:
Used in [[Special:NoticeTemplate]].

Parameters:
* $1 - an action link which is used to insert "Close" button. Its link text is {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-close-button}}.

This message is preceded by the following message:
* {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-edit-template-summary}}.
{{Identical|Insert}}
centralnotice-close-button: Used as action link text in [[Special:NoticeTemplate]]. The link is used to insert {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-close-title}} button.
centralnotice-close-title:
Used as tooltip for the action link to hide banner.
{{Identical|Close}}
centralnotice-banner-display-on: A label in a form. The options to select will be different platforms, such as "desktop", "Android" etc.
centralnotice-banner-mixins: Label for a list of banner "[[mw:Extension:CentralNotice/Banner_mixins|mixins]]", code components which can be reused between banners.
centralnotice-banner-mixins-help: Help text for editing a list of "[[mw:Extension:CentralNotice/Banner_mixins|banner mixins]]", code components which can be reused between banners.
centralnotice-banner-cdn-controls: Heading for section with front-end cache controls
centralnotice-banner-cdn-label: Label for drop-down and button to purge front-end cache for the selected language.
centralnotice-banner-cdn-button:
Text for button to purge front-end cache for the selected language.
{{Identical|Purge}}
centralnotice-banner-cdn-help: Help text for controls to purge front-end cache for the selected lanaguage
centralnotice-banner-cdn-dialog-waiting-: Text shown on front-end cache purge dialog if the request is for the purge is slow.
centralnotice-banner-cdn-dialog-error: Error message shown in front-end cache purge dalog
centralnotice-banner-cdn-dialog-success: Successful purge request shown in front-end cache purge dalog
centralnotice-geo: Used to label a checkbox which activates geotargeting
centralnotice-geo-status:
Used to display small helper text indicating which geo entities were selected.

Parameters:
* $1 â comma-separated list of two-letter codes of the selected (whole) countries, ending with a semicolon if both this and the other list contains entries
* $2 â comma-separated list of codes of the selected territories (states, regions, districts etc.)
centralnotice-regions: Used for campaign log details in [[Special:CentralNoticeLogs]].
centralnotice-location: Used as label for location field on campaign forms
centralnotice-location-filter: Used as label for the filter field in the location field on campaign forms
centralnotice-location-filter-clear: Used as label of the button that clears the filter field in the location field on campaign forms
centralnotice-location-name-and-code:
{{optional}}
Name and code of location (country or region) in geo tree selector in [[Special:CentralNotice]]. Parameters:
* $1 - The country or region name
* $2 The country or region code
centralnotice-allocation: Tab for sub-page [[m:BannerAllocation|banner allocation]] to central notice special page.
centralnotice-view-allocation: Heading of dialog box on [[m:Special:BannerAllocation|banner allocation]] special page.
centralnotice-allocation-instructions: Dialog box instructions on [[m:Special:BannerAllocation|banner allocation]] special page.
centralnotice-region: Used to label region drop-down in banner allocation
centralnotice-no-allocation: Message for nil result to query on [[m:Special:BannerAllocation|banner allocation]] special page.
centralnotice-allocation-description:
A description of the environment the allocation of which is being described. Parameters:
* $1 - the language code for the site (e.g "en")
* $2 - the project name for the site (e.g. "wikipedia")
* $3 - the country code (e.g. "US" for the United States, "FR" for France, etc.)
* $4 - the device class (e.g. "desktop", "OperaMini", "Android")
See also:
* {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-historical-allocation-description}}
centralnotice-historical-allocation-desc:
A description of the criteria used to calculate banner allocations. Parameters:
* $1 - the language code for the site (e.g "en")
* $2 - the project name for the site (e.g. "wikipedia")
* $3 - the country code (e.g. "US" for the United States, "FR" for France, etc.)
* $4 - the device class (e.g. "desktop", "OperaMini", "Android")
* $5 - historical snapshot time being analyzed
See also:
* {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-allocation-description}}
centralnotice-percentage:
Used as column header of the table in [[Special:BannerAllocation]].
{{Identical|Percentage}}
centralnotice-documentwrite-error: Used as error message shown by JavaScript function alert(). document.write() is JavaScript function name.
centralnotice-archived:
Label for archived field when displayed in logs
{{Identical|Archived}}
centralnotice-logs:
Label for tab which displays a log of changes
{{Identical|Log}}
centralnotice-view-logs:
Title of sub-page of [[meta:Special:CentralNoticeLogs|View Central Notice Logs]] special page.
{{Identical|View log}}
centralnotice-timestamp:
Used as column header in the table.
{{Identical|Timestamp}}
centralnotice-action:
Used as column header of the table.
{{Identical|Action}}
centralnotice-change-summary-heading:
Column header for summary/comment field in log table
{{Identical|Summary}}
centralnotice-action-created:
Indicates which type of action was performed. Should be lower-case, as if it appeared in the middle of a sentence.
{{Identical|Created}}
centralnotice-action-modified:
Indicates which type of action was performed. Should be lower-case, as if it appeared in the middle of a sentence.
{{Identical|Modified}}
centralnotice-action-removed:
Indicates which type of action was performed. Should be lower-case, as if it appeared in the middle of a sentence.
{{Identical|Removed}}
centralnotice-changed:
Parameters:
* $1 - the old banner assignments (can be one or more). When nothing was set, {{msg-mw|centralnotice-no-assignments}} is used.
* $2 - the new banner assignments (can be one or more). When nothing was set, {{msg-mw|centralnotice-no-assignments}} or empty string is used.
centralnotice-on:
indicates a notice is on air

{{Identical|On}}
centralnotice-off:
indicates a notice is not on air
{{Identical|Off}}
centralnotice-added:
Parameters:
* $1 - list of projects/languages/countries which were added
centralnotice-removed:
Parameters:
* $1 - list of projects/languages/countries which were removed
centralnotice-talk-link:
Link for user talk page; should be lower case.
{{Identical|Talk}}
centralnotice-anon: Label for a setting. Used as parameter $1 of {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-log-label}}
centralnotice-account: Label for a setting. Used as parameter $1 of {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-log-label}}
centralnotice-fundraising: Label for a setting. Used as parameter $1 of {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-log-label}}. {{Identical|Fundraising}}
centralnotice-autolink: Label for a setting. Used as parameter $1 of {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-log-label}}
centralnotice-landingpages: Label for a setting. Used as parameter $1 of {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-log-label}}
centralnotice-controller_mixin: Label for a setting. Used as parameter $1 of {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-log-label}} (a mixin is a small bit of code added to change base functionality)
centralnotice-campaign-mixins: Label for a setting. Used as parameter $1 of {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-log-label}} (extra campaign features are provided by campaign mixins)
centralnotice-category: Label for a setting. Used as parameter $1 of {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-log-label}}
centralnotice-banner-content-changed: Used as parameter $2 of {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-log-label}}. (Parameter $1 of the above message is {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-banner-content}}.)
centralnotice-filters: Label for a set of options that control filtering of logs
centralnotice-damaged-log:
This is an annotation on banners or campaigns with inconsistent log entries. Parameters:
* $1 - name of the damaged record
centralnotice-date:
Label for a date selection interface.
{{Identical|Date}}
centralnotice-apply-filters:
Label for a submit button.
{{Identical|Apply filter}}
centralnotice-clear-filters: Label for a submit button. Clear as in reset.
centralnotice-filter-template-prompt: Label for a banner name search string; terms are space delimited
centralnotice-filter-template-submit:
Button label: on click will apply a filter to the banners displayed.
{{Identical|Apply filter}}
centralnotice-filter-template-banner: Section heading label for the banner filter bar
centralnotice-priority-low:
Label for the lowest campaign priority setting. An adjective that describes the priority.
{{Identical|Low}}
centralnotice-priority-normal:
Label for a normal (medium) campaign priority setting. An adjective that describes the priority.
{{Identical|Normal}}
centralnotice-priority-high:
Label for a high campaign priority setting. An adjective that describes the priority.
{{Identical|High}}
centralnotice-priority-emergency: Label for the highest campaign priority setting (to be used in emergencies). An adjective that describes the priority.
centralnotice-prioritylangs:
Label for section marking priority languages for translation.
{{Identical|Priority language}}
centralnotice-prioritylangs-explain: Description notifying the user that marking a language as a priority will encourage translators to translate selected languages first.
centralnotice-aggregate-group-desc: Description of what Central Notice banners do for the group description in the translate extension.
centralnotice-country-eu: Label for MaxMind country "EU", European Union, used rarely when further information is not known
centralnotice-country-ap: Label for MaxMind country "AP", Asia Pacific Region, used rarely when further information is not known
centralnotice-country-a1: Label for MaxMind country "A1", Anonymous Proxy, used when the IP address belongs to an anonymization service
centralnotice-country-a2: Label for MaxMind country "A2", Satellite Provider, used when the IP address belongs to a global internet provider
centralnotice-country-o1: Label for MaxMind country "O1", Other Country, used very rarely in foggy circumstances that MaxMind doesn't elaborate on
centralnotice-country-unknown: Label for country "XX", the generic place where all the people we cannot geolocate live.
centralnotice-buckets: Label for the option to enable user bucketing for a campaign, i.e. assigning users to groups that only see certain banners. Each of these groups is called a "bucket". See the English Wikipedia article [[:w:en:Data binning|Data binning]].
centralnotice-bucket: Label for the select list that the campaign manager uses to assign a banner to a certain user bucket.
centralnotice-bucket-letter:
Label for specifying what bucket is being used. Parameters:
* $1 - a bucket letter (uppercase alphabet)
centralnotice-banner-empty-bucket: Warning that a campaign bucket is misconfigured and no banners are assigned.
centralnotice-devicetype-desktop: Dropdown selector label for identifying clients using a desktop computer
centralnotice-devicetype-android: Dropdown selector label for identifying clients on the mobile site that identify as running Android OS
centralnotice-devicetype-ipad: Dropdown selector label for identifying clients on the mobile site that identify using an iOS device that is not an iPhone
centralnotice-devicetype-iphone: Dropdown selector label for identifying clients on the mobile site that identify using a device that identies as an iPhone
centralnotice-devicetype-unknown: Dropdown selector label for identifying clients on the mobile site that are not iOS or Android
centralnotice-all:
Used when a list contains all possible elements.
{{Identical|All}}
centralnotice-banner-name-error: Used as error message when creating a banner or navigating to an invalid banner name.
centralnotice-all-except:
A list which nearly contains every possible element, by only listing what is excluded. Parameters:
* $1 - a comma-separated list of excluded elements
centralnotice-excluding-list:
A list followed by what has been excluded. Parameters:
* $1 - a comma-separated list of included elements
* $2 - a comma-separated list of excluded elements
centralnotice-user-role: Label for a logged-in / anonymous user column
centralnotice-user-role-anonymous:
Label for the anonymous user role.
{{Identical|Anonymous}}
centralnotice-user-role-logged-in: Label for the logged-in user role
centralnotice-banner-class-desc:
Used as help message for the {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-banner-class}} select box which has the following options:

A "hide cookie" is a cookie that is created when a user asks to hide a banner.

"Impression" is an instance of showing the banner to a reader. For example, the banner was shown to the site readers a hundred times, then the impression count is 100.
centralnotice-templates-included: Used as label for the list of included templates.
centralnotice-archive-banner-title:
Used as title for the dialog box.

Followed by the confirmation message {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-archive-banner-confirm}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of banners
centralnotice-archive-banner-confirm: Used as confirmation message in the dialog box which has the title {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-archive-banner-title}}.
centralnotice-change-summary-label:
Label before text field for summarizing changes
{{Identical|Summary}}
centralnotice-archive-show: Checkbox text that determines if archived campaigns are shown or hidden
centralnotice-archive-campaign-title:
Used as title for the dialog box.

Followed by the confirmation message {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-archive-campaign-confirm}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of campaigns
centralnotice-archive-campaign-confirm: Used as confirmation message in the dialog box which has the title {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-archive-campaign-title}}.
centralnotice-archive-edit-prevented: Descriptive banner used on the page to describe why it cannot be edited.
centralnotice-archived-campaigns: Header for list of archived campaigns
centralnotice-add-new-banner-title: A title for the dialog for adding a new banner.
centralnotice-delete-banner-title:
Used as title for the dialog box.

Followed by the confirmation message {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-delete-banner-confirm}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of banners
centralnotice-delete-banner-confirm: Used as confirmation message in the dialog box which has the title {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-delete-banner-title}}.
centralnotice-messages-pending-approval: Label for a list of languages in which banner messages are pending approval
centralnotice-devices: Log line label for showing a list of devices (e.g. iphone, desktop) that the banner will display on. Used as $1 in {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-log-label}} ($2 is a list of devices).
centralnotice-start-time: Used in Special:CentralNotice. UTC is "[[w:Coordinated_Universal_Time|Coordinated Universal Time]]"
centralnotice-end-time: Used in Special:CentralNotice. UTC is "[[w:Coordinated_Universal_Time|Coordinated Universal Time]]"
centralnotice-banner-not-found-title: Page title and top header of Special:CentralNoticeBanners when the requested banner does not exist
centralnotice-banner-not-found-contents: Used as the body content of SpecialCentral:NoticeBanners when the requested banner does not exist
centralnotice-csp-violation-alert: Alert displayed when a content security policy violation is detected in a banner preview. $1 is the URL of the violating request.
centralnotice-specialhidebanners-p3p: Explanation of default invalid P3P header for Special:HideBanners/P3P.
centralnotice-banner-history-logger: Name of the banner history logger campaign mixin, for adminsitration UI control
centralnotice-banner-history-logger-help: Description of the banner history feature
centralnotice-banner-history-logger-rate: Label for the banner history logger campaign mixin sample rate control in the administration UI
Help text for the sample rate field
centralnotice-banner-history-logger-max-: Label for the banner history logger campaign mixin maximum entry age control in the administration UI
Help text for the log expiration age field
Label for the banner history logger campaign mixin maximum number of log entries control in the administration UI
Help text for the maximum log size field
centralnotice-banner-history-logger-wait: Label for field for time limit to delay sending the log without sendBeacon, for the banner history logger campaign mixin
Help text for field for time limit to delay sending the log without sendBeacon, for the banner history logger campaign mixin
centralnotice-legacy-support: Name of the legacy support campaign mixin, for administration UI control
centralnotice-legacy-support-help: Description of the legacy support feature
centralnotice-set-record-impression-samp: Label for the control to activate setting the sample rate for Special:RecordImpression, for the legacy support campaign mixin
centralnotice-custom-record-impression-s: Label for the control to determine the sample rate for Special:RecordImpression, for the legacy support campaign mixin
centralnotice-banners-not-guaranteed-to-: Label for the control to indicate that banners might not display, for the legacy support campaign mixin
centralnotice-impression-diet: Label for the banner impression diet mixin
centralnotice-impression-diet-help: Help text for the banner impression diet mixin
centralnotice-impression-diet-identifier: Label for the form control to set diet identifier/cookie name
centralnotice-impression-diet-maximum-se: Label for the form control to set maximum seen count
centralnotice-impression-diet-restart-cy: Label for the form control to set cycle restart delay
centralnotice-impression-diet-skip-initi: Label for the form control to skip initial impressions
centralnotice-large-banner-limit: Label for the large banner limit mixin
centralnotice-large-banner-limit-help: Help text for the large banner limit mixin
centralnotice-large-banner-limit-days: Label for the form control to set large banner suppression length
centralnotice-large-banner-limit-days-he: Help text for the form control to set large banner suppression length
centralnotice-large-banner-limit-randomi: Label for the form control to randomize bucket transition
Help text for the form control to randomize bucket transition
centralnotice-large-banner-limit-identif: Label for the form control to set a large banner identifier/cookie name
Help text for the form control to set large banner identifier/cookie name
centralnotice-banner-sequence: Label for the banner sequence mixin
centralnotice-banner-sequence-help: Help text for the banner sequence mixin
centralnotice-banner-sequence-days: Label for the form control to set the number of days identifiers for suppressing steps will remain in effect.
centralnotice-banner-sequence-days-error: Error message for invalid data entered in the form control to set the number of days that identifiers will remain in effect.
centralnotice-banner-sequence-days-help:
Help text for the form control to set the number of days identifiers for suppressing steps will remain in effect.

* "Skip with identifier" is {{msg-mw|Centralnotice-banner-sequence-skip-with-id}}
centralnotice-banner-sequence-bucket-seq:
Label for a sequence for a given bucket and total number of page views in the sequence. Parameters:
* $1 - Alphabetic label for the bucket
* $2 Number of page views in the sequence
centralnotice-banner-sequence-bucket-add: Label for a button to add step to a banner sequence
centralnotice-banner-sequence-banner:
Label for a drop-down form control to select a banner for a step in a banner sequence
{{Identical|Banner}}
centralnotice-banner-sequence-page-views: Label for a form control for the number of page views in a step in a banner sequence
centralnotice-banner-sequence-skip-with-: Label for a form control to set an identifier stored in a user's browser to prevent the repeated display of a step in a banner sequence
centralnotice-banner-sequence-banner-rem: Error message to display below a form control to select a banner, if other controls on the page have been used to remove the banner or modify its bucket assignment.
centralnotice-banner-sequence-page-views: Error message for invalid data entered in a form control for the number of page views of a step in a banner sequence
centralnotice-banner-sequence-skip-with-: Error message for invalid data entered in form control to set an identifier stored in a user's browser to prevent the repeated display of a step in a banner sequence
centralnotice-banner-sequence-no-banner: Text for option in banner drop-down form control to show no banner for a step in a banner sequence
centralnotice-impression-events-sample-r: Label for impression events sample rate mixin
Help text for impression events sample rate mixin
Label for the control to set the sample rate for impression events
centralnotice-navbar: {{notranslate}} Shown prior to {{msg-mw|centralnotice-summary}}. Meant to allow end users to customize the CentralNotice interface with a custom header.
centralnotice-banner-protection-log-reas: Protection reason as displayed on [[Special:Log/protect]] and in other logs.
centralnotice-multiple-countries: Label that indicates that a banner is targetted to several countries.
centralnotice-multiple-regions: Label that indicates that a banner is targetted to several regions.
centralnotice-multiple-languages: Label that indicates that a banner is targetted to several languages.
tag-centralnotice_translation: Display name for 'centralnotice translation' revision tag
centralnotice-banner-template: Label for the section used to mark banners as templates in the form in [[Special:CentralNoticeBanners]]
centralnotice-banner-is-template: Label for checkbox used to mark banners as templates in the form in [[Special:CentralNoticeBanners]]
centralnotice-banner-template-error: Error message displayed in Special:CentralNotice when trying to add a banner based on a banner that is invalid
centralnotice-add-banner-from-template: Label for 'Add a banner from template' button
centralnotice-messages-banner-in-campaig: Info text describing why marking banner as a template is disabled
centralnotice-campaign-view-logs: Label for navigation link to this campaign's settings logs. Shown in subtitle of Special:CentralNotice for a specific campaign.
prefs-centralnotice-banners: Used in [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-banners|Special:Preferences]] for the name of the tab with banner/CentralNotice controls. '''This appears on client wikis'''.
prefs-centralnotice-display-banner-types: Used in [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-banners|Special:Preferences]] '''on client wikis''', tab "Banners", as section header above controls for banner types to display.
prefs-description-centralnotice-banners: Used in [[Special:Preferences]] for mobile to describe the Banners features section.
centralnotice-campaign-type:
A label for a list for selecting the type of the campaign.

* Used as column header of the table in [[Special:CentralNotice]].
* Used as label for the campaign type drop-down.
{{Related|Centralnotice-th}}
centralnotice-empty-campaign-type-option: Text for the option to set no type assigned to a campaign.
centralnotice-non-existent-campaign-type: Error message for non-existant campaign type.
centralntoice-deleted-campaign-type:
Text to show in campaign type drop-down. Parameters:
* $1 - The string identifier of the deleted type.
centralnotice-campaign-type-advocacy: Name of campaign type for campaigns relating to advocacy. Used in user preferences '''on client wikis''' and CentralNotice campaign configuration. Included as a default type in $wgCentralNoticeCampaignTypes.
centralnotice-campaign-type-article-writ: Name of campaign type for campaigns relating to article writing. Used in user preferences '''on client wikis''' and CentralNotice campaign configuration. Included as a default type in $wgCentralNoticeCampaignTypes.
centralnotice-campaign-type-event: Name of campaign type for campaigns relating to events. Used in user preferences '''on client wikis''' and CentralNotice campaign configuration. Included as a default type in $wgCentralNoticeCampaignTypes.
centralnotice-campaign-type-fundraising: Name of campaign type for campaigns relating to fundraising. Used in user preferences '''on client wikis''' and CentralNotice campaign configuration. Included as a default type in $wgCentralNoticeCampaignTypes.
centralnotice-campaign-type-governance: Name of campaign type for campaigns relating to governance. Used in user preferences '''on client wikis''' and CentralNotice campaign configuration. Included as a default type in $wgCentralNoticeCampaignTypes.
centralnotice-campaign-type-maintenance: Name of campaign type for campaigns relating to site maintenance. Used in user preferences '''on client wikis''' and CentralNotice campaign configuration. Included as a default type in $wgCentralNoticeCampaignTypes.
centralnotice-campaign-type-photography: Name of campaign type for campaigns relating to photography. Used in user preferences '''on client wikis''' and CentralNotice campaign configuration. Included as a default type in $wgCentralNoticeCampaignTypes.
centralnotice-campaign-type-special: Name of campaign type for campaigns of a special category, which cannot be hidden by preferences. Used in user preferences '''on client wikis''' and CentralNotice campaign configuration. Included as a default type in $wgCentralNoticeCampaignTypes.
centralnotice-user-prefs-intro: Explanatory introduction for section in user preferences '''on client wikis''' where users can select which banner types to display.
namespaceinfo-description-ns867: Description for the CNBanner talk namespace
